atk-s0303a5:1_1: Kilesasaṁyutte cittasseso upakkilesoti kataracittassa? Catubhūmakacittassa. Tebhūmakacittassa tāva hotu,
atk-s0303a5:1_3: So hi tassa uppajjituṁ appadānena upakkilesoti veditabbo.
atk-s0303a5:1_6: Abhiññā sacchikaraṇīyesu dhammesūti paccavekkhaṇañāṇena abhijānitvā sacchikātabbesu chaḷabhiññādhammesu,
atk-s0303a5:1_7: ekaṁ dhammaṁ vā gaṇhantena nekkhammanti gahetabbaṁ. Sesaṁ sabbattha uttānamevāti.
